string.name: game_intro
string.br: You have been carried in the Wumpus\' world, a dark and dangerous place...
Do you want to test yourself? Really?
Are you looking for glory and richness?
Will you find out where the monster is and steal its treasures?
Will you capable of survive his anger?
Or wait...Are you the creature that is been chased by the hunter?Yep, it is you!
Will you protect your lair? Will survive the hunt? The choice is yoursâ€¦
Experience history as it has already been written or live into the world of the Wumpus that now is upside down!

resources.string: Here you are! Let\'s go on adventure, brave hero!
Here you are! Hurry up, poor Wumpus, run away!
